spatial_accuracy.notes: Door to Toilet-1 from Bedroom-1 is missing its swing direction. One window in Bedroom-1 is slightly smaller than implied.

structural_fidelity.notes: All structural fidelity criteria met. No text, perfect cutaway, no hallucinations, and appropriate presentation context.

furniture_mapping.notes: All major and minor fixtures are present. Furniture placement is accurate with minor proportional differences for some items (e.g., dining chairs). The chair in the small nook in Bedroom-1 is slightly off-scale. Maid's Room desk/chair is more abstract than other furniture.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Low-poly, flat shaded, clean edges, and solid colors are present. Lighting is mostly ambient but shows very subtle directional shadows in some corners - not dramatic but present. True isometric projection and composition are perfect.

detected_errors.description: Door swing direction for Toilet-1 from Bedroom-1 is not indicated.
Window in Bedroom-1 (bottom right) is slightly smaller than proportional representation in the 2D plan.
Chair in Bedroom-1 (small nook) is slightly off-scale. Maid's Room desk/chair is a very abstract block.
Minimal, soft directional shadows are present in corners, slightly deviating from purely flat lighting.

summary: The generated 3D render is highly accurate, maintaining geometric precision, structural fidelity, and appropriate aesthetic qualities, with only minor discrepancies in door swing direction and subtle shadow rendering.
